start:
Hi! I'm a bot that can help you
collect
waifus or husbandos from various animes. To get started, type /help
help: There is a list of commands you can use: /start - Start the bot /help - Get a list of commands /language - Change the language used to display messages /collect - Collect a waifu/husbando /list - List all the waifus/husbandos you have collected /listm - Same as above, but as images /delete - Delete a waifu/husbando
language: Select the language you want to use to display messages:
language_set: The language has been set to {0}
already_collected: You have already collected {1} in this group!
list: Here is a list of all the waifus/husbandos you have collected in this group:
